con:request.name: SubmitClaim
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:com="urn://com.bupa.bi.claims.SubmitClaim_v1_0" xmlns:com1="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.Claim_v1_0" xmlns:com2="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.ClaimInvoice_v1_0" xmlns:com3="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Provider_v1_0" xmlns:com4="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Procedure_v1_0" xmlns:com5="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Diagnosis_v1_0"> <soapenv:Header> <tpa_organization>Test</tpa_organization> <tpa_password>LZ2xO9kHZwHnBXH8t9FS2xXKZXaVwt+qhndERot9+DI=</tpa_password> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <com:SubmitClaimRequest> <com:RequestUsername>${DataSource#RequestUserName}</com:RequestUsername> <com:Claim> <!--Optional:--> <com1:BupaClaimId>${DataSource#BupaClaimId}</com1:BupaClaimId> <!--Optional:--> <com1:Version>${DataSource#Version}</com1:Version> <!--Optional:--> <com1:PartnerClaimReference>${DataSource#PartnerClaimReference}</com1:PartnerClaimReference> <!--Optional:--> <com1:BupaPreAuthReference>${DataSource#BupaPreAuthReference}</com1:BupaPreAuthReference> <!--Optional:--> <com1:Status>${DataSource#Status}</com1:Status> <!--Optional:--> <com1:SuspendReason>${DataSource#SuspendReason}</com1:SuspendReason> <!--Optional:--> <com1:SuspendReasonDescription xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> <!--Optional:--> <com1:BupaMemberId>${DataSource#BupaMemberId}</com1:BupaMemberId> <!--Optional:--> <com1:ClaimReceivedDate>${DataSource#ClaimsRecievedDate}</com1:ClaimReceivedDate> <!--Optional:--> <com1:TotalClaimedAmount>${DataSource#TotalClaimedAmount}</com1:TotalClaimedAmount> <!--Optional:--> <com1:TotalPaidAmount>${DataSource#TotalPaidAmount}</com1:TotalPaidAmount> <!--Optional:--> <com1:CurrencyCode>${DataSource#CurrencyCode}</com1:CurrencyCode> <!--Optional:--> <com1:Notes>${DataSource#Notes}</com1:Notes> <!--Optional:--> <com1:MedicalRecordConsent>${DataSource#MedicalRecordConsent}</com1:MedicalRecordConsent> <!--Optional:--> <com1:Invoices> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <com2:Invoice> <!--Optional:--> <com2:InvoiceNumber>${DataSource#InvoiceNumber}</com2:InvoiceNumber> <!--Optional:--> <com2:InvoiceDate>${DataSource#InvoiceDate}</com2:InvoiceDate> <!--Optional:--> <com2:Provider> <!--Optional:--> <com3:BupaProviderId>${DataSource#BupaProviderId}</com3:BupaProviderId> <!--Optional:--> <com3:PartnerReference>${DataSource#PartnerReference}</com3:PartnerReference> <!--Optional:--> <com3:Name>${DataSource#Name}</com3:Name> <!--Optional:--> <com3:CountryCode>${DataSource#Country Code}</com3:CountryCode> </com2:Provider> <!--Optional:--> <com2:PayeeType>${DataSource#PayeeType}</com2:PayeeType> <!--Optional:--> <com2:TreatmentCountryCode>${DataSource#TreatmentCountryCode}</com2:TreatmentCountryCode> <!--Optional:--> <com2:ClaimedAmount>${DataSource#ClaimedAmount}</com2:ClaimedAmount> <!--Optional:--> <com2:ClaimedCurrencyCode>${DataSource#ClaimedCurrencyCode}</com2:ClaimedCurrencyCode> <!--Optional:--> <com2:PaidAmount>${DataSource#PaidAmount}</com2:PaidAmount> <!--Optional:--> <com2:PaidCurrencyCode>${DataSource#PaidCurrencyCode}</com2:PaidCurrencyCode> <!--Optional:--> <com2:InvoiceLines> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <com2:InvoiceLine> <!--Optional:--> <com2:ItemReference>${DataSource#Item Reference}</com2:ItemReference> <!--Optional:--> <com2:BupaBenefitID>${DataSource#Benefit Code}</com2:BupaBenefitID> <!--Optional:--> <com2:TreatmentFromDate>${DataSource#TreatmentFromDate}</com2:TreatmentFromDate> <!--Optional:--> <com2:TreatmentToDate>${DataSource#TreatmentToDate}</com2:TreatmentToDate> <!--Optional:--> <com2:NumberOfIncidents>${DataSource#NumberOfIncidents}</com2:NumberOfIncidents> <!--Optional:--> <com2:ClaimedAmount>${DataSource#ClaimedAmount}</com2:ClaimedAmount> <!--Optional:--> <com2:PaidAmount>${DataSource#PaidAmount}</com2:PaidAmount> <!--Optional:--> <com2:RejectionReason>${DataSource#RejectionReason}</com2:RejectionReason> <!--Optional:--> <com2:RejectionReasonDescription>${DataSource#RejectionReasonDescription}</com2:RejectionReasonDescription> <!--Optional:--> <com2:Copay>${DataSource#Copay}</com2:Copay> <!--Optional:--> <com2:CoInsurance>${DataSource#CoInsurance}</com2:CoInsurance> <!--Optional:--> <com2:PrimaryProcedure> <!--Optional:--> <com4:Code>${DataSource#Code}</com4:Code> <!--Optional:--> <com4:Description>${DataSource#Description}</com4:Description> <!--Optional:--> <com4:Standard>${DataSource#Standard}</com4:Standard> </com2:PrimaryProcedure> </com2:InvoiceLine> </com2:InvoiceLines> <!--Optional:--> <com2:PrimaryDiagnosis> <!--Optional:--> <com5:Code>${DataSource#DiagnosisCode}</com5:Code> <!--Optional:--> <com5:Description>${DataSource#DiagnosisDescription}</com5:Description> <!--Optional:--> <com5:Standard>${DataSource#DiagnosisStandard}</com5:Standard> </com2:PrimaryDiagnosis> </com2:Invoice> </com1:Invoices> </com:Claim> </com:SubmitClaimRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

repetitions:--> <com2:Invoice> <!--Optional:--> <com2:InvoiceNumber>${DataSource#InvoiceNumber}</com2:InvoiceNumber> <!--Optional:--> <com2:InvoiceDate>${DataSource#InvoiceDate}</com2:InvoiceDate> <!--Optional:--> <com2:Provider> <!--Optional:--> <com3:BupaProviderId>${DataSource#BupaProviderId}</com3:BupaProviderId> <!--Optional:--> <com3:PartnerReference>${DataSource#PartnerReference}</com3:PartnerReference> <!--Optional:--> <com3:Name>${DataSource#Name}</com3:Name> <!--Optional:--> <com3:CountryCode>${DataSource#Country Code}</com3:CountryCode> </com2:Provider> <!--Optional:--> <com2:PayeeType>${DataSource#PayeeType}</com2:PayeeType> <!--Optional:--> <com2:TreatmentCountryCode>${DataSource#TreatmentCountryCode}</com2:TreatmentCountryCode> <!--Optional:--> <com2:ClaimedAmount>${DataSource#ClaimedAmount}</com2:ClaimedAmount> <!--Optional:--> <com2:TreatmentFromDate>${DataSource#TreatmentFromDate}</com2:TreatmentFromDate> <!--Optional:--> <com2:TreatmentToDate>${DataSource#TreatmentToDate}</com2:TreatmentToDate> <!--Optional:--> <com2:NumberOfIncidents>${DataSource#NumberOfIncidents}</com2:NumberOfIncidents> <!--Optional:--> <com2:ClaimedAmount>${DataSource#ClaimedAmount}</com2:ClaimedAmount> <!--Optional:-->
